summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Nightbreed: The Director's Cut (Bluray / DVD Combo) [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2015/06/14 Store: Craig Sheffer (Actor), Anne Bobby (Actor), Clive Barker (Director) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ["For the first time on home video, you can experience Clive Barker's original director's cut of NIGHTBREED with over 40 minutes of new footage, all mastered in high definition from the original camera negative! Boone (Craig Sheffer) may be a troubled young man, but his troubles are just beginning. Set up as the fall guy in a string of slasher murders, he decides he'll hide by crossing the threshold that separates 'us' from 'them' and sneak into the forbidden subterranean realm of Midian. Boone will live among the monsters. HELLRAISER creator Clive Barker writes (adapting his novel Cabal) and directs this vivid leap into horror that asks: in the battle of man vs. Monster, who's really the monster? The answer supplies flesh-crawling suspense, sudden fear, a colorful Danny Elfman score and a creepy array of shape-shifting beings. They are the Nightbreed, denizens of a world beyond death, beyond the imagination, perhaps beyond anything you've seen."] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Horror', 'Format': "Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen, Director's Cut", 'Contributor': 'Craig Sheffer, Anne Bobby, David Cronenberg, Clive Barker', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '2 hours', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SFY15283BR', 'Director': 'Clive Barker', 'Media Format': "Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen, Director's Cut", 'Run time': '2 hours', 'Release date': 'October 28, 2014', 'Actors': 'Craig Sheffer, Anne Bobby, David Cronenberg', 'Studio': 'Shout Factory', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: If you were a fan of book "Cabal" and then got let down by the studio's cut of the film...you are in for a TREAT. Twenty minutes longer with forty minutes of footage not in the theatrical release? Very much a whole new film. And you can feel it throughout. This isn't just some extra fluff to say it was longer. There are entire plot points that now make sense. The citizens of Midian are back to being the good guys.

This was one of the single best presents I've picked up for myself in a long, long time as a fan of the book, the comics, and the author. Review Title: The citizens of Midian are back to being the good guys. This was one of the single best ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Necessary Evil: Super-Villains of DC Comics [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2015/11/03 Store: Christopher Lee (Actor) Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray Product Description: ['Necessary Evil: Villains of DC Comics (Blu-ray)', 'THE JOKER, LEX LUTHOR, CATWOMAN, DOOMSDAY, BANE. What makes them so thrillingly watchable? So terribly wonderful? So extremely vital to our super heroes and their worlds? This new feature-length documentary explores these questions across seven decades of DC Comics’ hallowed Rogues’ Gallery of infamous evildoers. Narrated by esteemed film villain Christopher Lee,examines the tortured psyches of your favorite animation, comic book, game, TV and feature film baddies – both from the past and into the future – against the backdrop of culture, history and society. Insights from famed creators and storytellers, including Zack Snyder, Guillermo del Toro, Jim Lee, Geoff Johns and Richard Donner, shine a fascinating light on those malevolent, charismatic characters who thrive in the dark. PREPARE FOR DIABOLICAL DELIGHT!', ']]>'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Christopher Lee, Jack Mulligan, Scott Devine, J.M. Kenny', 'Language': 'English', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WHV1000373057BR', 'Director': 'Scott Devine, J.M. Kenny', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Release date': 'October 25, 2013', 'Actors': 'Christopher Lee', 'Producers': 'Scott Devine, J.M. Kenny', 'Writers': 'Scott Devine, Jack Mulligan', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Very interesting presentation. Review Title: Four Stars Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Underworld: Awakening [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2015/11/19 Store: Kate Beckinsale (Actor), Stephen Rea (Actor), Måns Mårlind (Director), Björn Stein (Director) & 1 more Rated: R Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ["KATE BECKINSALE returns as the ultimate vampire warrioress Selene in Underworld Awakening, the stunning new installment of the epic saga. Having escaped years of imprisonment, she finds herself in a changed world where humans have discovered the existence of both Vampire and Lycan clans and are conducting an all-out war to eradicate both immortal species. Now Selene must battle the humans and a frightening new breed of super Lycans to ensure the death dealers' survival."] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action, Sci-Fi, Horror, Thriller', 'Format': 'AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Stephen Rea, Michael Ealy, Måns Mårlind, Kate Beckinsale, Björn Stein, Charles Dance, Sandrine Holt, Catlin Adams, Theo James, India Eisley, Adam Greydon Reid, Kris Holden-RiedStephen Rea, Michael Ealy, Måns Mårlind, Kate Beckinsale, Björn Stein, Charles Dance, Sandrine Holt, Catlin Adams, Theo James, India Eisley, Adam Greydon Reid, Kris Holden-Ried See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 29 minutes', 'Digital Copy Expiration Date': 'December 31, 2017', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1201', 'Director': 'Måns Mårlind, Björn Stein', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 29 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 5, 2013', 'Actors': 'Kate Beckinsale, Stephen Rea, Michael Ealy, Theo James, India Eisley', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Subtitles': 'English, French', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Meh. It was a gift and she likes it just fine. Review Title: It was a gift and she likes it just fine. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Teen Titans: The Complete Second Season Review Date: 2016/06/04 Store: Scott Menville (Actor), Greg Cipes (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Today's Deals, Featured Deals & New Releases Product Description: ['Teen Titans: The Complete Second Season (DVD)', "Fighting for truth, justice and the last slice of pizza, these five superheroes are living proof that you're never too young to save the planet. Protecting Earth and beyond, the Teen Titans live and operate from their T-shaped, high-tech headquarters. Using martial arts and cutting-edge gadgetry, the teens battle villains, giant monsters and alien invaders--and still find time to argue over who's going to do the dishes. As the hip teens try to find their place in the world, they must also cope with the tribulations of adolescence.", ']]>'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy, Mystery & Suspense/Crime, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Animated', 'Contributor': 'Tara Strong, Bruce Timm, Scott Menville, Greg Cipes, Hynden Walch, Khary Payton, Glen Murakami', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround)', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.75 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'unknown', 'Media Format': 'Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Animated', 'Run time': '4 hours and 46 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 12, 2006', 'Actors': 'Scott Menville, Greg Cipes, Khary Payton, Tara Strong, Hynden Walch', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Glen Murakami, Bruce Timm', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: So much Terra. I really do love the way this show developed. Review Title: I really do love the way this show developed Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The purchase history reveals a distinct preference for genre films, particularly horror and superhero-themed content, underscoring an affinity for complex narratives featuring morally ambiguous characters. The individual rated products highly, typically scoring between 4.0 to 5.0, suggesting strong satisfaction with their selections. There is a notable emphasis on director's cuts and expanded editions, indicating a desire for comprehensive storytelling and deeper engagement with source material, as exemplified by purchases linked to Clive Barker and DC Comics. 

Common themes revolve around cinematic experiences that explore themes of the fantastical and the monstrous, displaying a taste for deep character exploration and plot intricacies. The individual appreciates quality production, often opting for Blu-ray formats, hinting at a preference for high-definition visuals and sound quality. Price sensitivity appears moderate, as the inclination toward collectible formats like Blu-ray suggests a willingness to invest in valued experiences.

Overall, the individual demonstrates a nuanced appreciation for horror and action genres, characterized by a craving for immersive storytelling, visual fidelity, and enhanced editorial content, aligning with a discerning viewer profile that prioritizes both entertainment and thematic depth.

target_interaction.title: I'll never not like these.
target_interaction.text: A classic. I'll never not like these.
target_interaction.title_meta: Teen Titans - The Complete First Season (DC Comics Kids Collection)
description: Teen Titans: The Complete First Season (DVD)

With awesome super skills and powers galore, these crimefighting partners kick butt and squash evil like nobody’s business! But as roommates in Titans Tower,™ it’s every hero for him- or herself when it comes to living in peace. Not even super heroes can settle fights over who’s in control of the TV remote! In these 13 action-packed adventures, the Titans face all your favorite villains – Mad Mod, The Puppet King, Killer Moth and, of course, their archnemesis Slade – in one power-packing showdown after another. Some battles even pit the Titans against each other! Featuring bold animation, funky music and fun characters, this complete Season One from the hit TV series is an intergalactic knockout!
The complete first season of Cartoon Network and WBTV's fine adaptation of Marv Wolfman and George Perez's '80s-era DC Comics title

arrives in a 13-episode two-disc set. The attractive, anime-influenced episodes of the series' 2003 debut season pit the Titans--former Batman sidekick Robin, Beast Boy, Starfire, Cyborg, Terra, and Raven--against a horde of regular foes, including Slade (voiced by Ron Perlman), Trigon, Trident, Mad Mod, and many others. True to their age, the Titans also have to deal with issues about maturity, confidence, a hint of romance, and even a body-switch between two members.
